item.title: 7 Innovative Companies Using A.I. to Disrupt Their Industries
item.description:
7 Innovative Companies Using A.I. to Disrupt Their Industries

Despite predictions of a tech slowdown, big-name businesses like Facebook, Apple, and IBM are pouring resources into artificial intelligence (AI), changing the field and gaining the interest of venture capitalists everywhere. As investors actively seek innovative players in the AI space, more entrepreneurs are gravitating toward the technology as they build and grow their own companies.

item.title: "You Suck" means you have plenty of opportunities.
item.description:
"You Suck" means you have plenty of opportunities.

In this, we learn more about ourselves and how we can better execute. Creating a culture of greatness takes a community. Every story of success is a story of a community.Where are we failing? You are right...it sucks in it's current state. It needs to be better. It is evolving everyday.

item.title: The Grid - October Update
item.description:
The Grid - October Update

On October 8thâ€Š-â€Šthe one year anniversary of our Founding Member Campaign launchâ€Š-â€Šwe flipped the switch and began Grid Beta auto-activations. Every day since, we've activated 100 new Founding Members who've begun building the first sites on The Grid. And we know: it's about time.

item.title: Update from Estonia Hack-a-Thon
item.description:
Update from Estonia Hack-a-Thon

By Dan Tocchini IV

item.title: The Grid - September Update
item.description:
The Grid - September Update

First off, a big thanks to everyone who took the survey last week. You sent us thousands of responses and we read every single one. One thing we learned - you'd like to hear more about what we're doing, more often. Point taken.

item.title: The Grid - Beta Update & Survey
item.description:
The Grid - Beta Update & Survey

That's just it though: trying to teach a newborn system how to think about color is... well, also crazy. Because color theory is hard. It's not just scientific; it's psychological. But see, we're crazy enough to try it. And you know what? It's starting to work. That's why we're excited, not scared.

item.title: The Grid - Design Systems & API Demo
item.description:
The Grid - Design Systems & API Demo

Since our last update, we've made quite a bit of progress and wanted to give you a snapshot of some of the most exciting developments on The Grid. This is a long one, so get comfortable, settle in with a cup of coffee (or tea), and read on.

item.title: The Grid - Beta FAQ & Updates
item.description:
The Grid - Beta FAQ & Updates

I have a site I've been waiting to build on The Grid, should I keep waiting? We understand that some of you may be on timelines that require you to choose another website platform, and we are truly sorry for the wait. We are eager to get you onboard and using The Grid too!

item.title: The Grid - Beta Update
item.description:
The Grid - Beta Update

To be clear, we will not start the clock on your subscriptions until beta testing is complete. And as a thank you for your early support, we're going to credit you with an additional six months free on your subscription to The Grid.
